courseDetails.title: Shopify: Your Essential Guide to E-commerce Success
courseDetails.shortDescription: Kickstart your online business on Shopify and make it thrive
courseDetails.longDescription:
Whether you’re an aspiring entrepreneur, a small business owner, or a freelancer who is just starting in online retail, I bet you’re constantly in search of new opportunities to boost your sales and attract new customers. And what if I say that one of such opportunities is right at your fingertips? It’s Shopify, one of the most popular e-commerce platforms and a comprehensive ecosystem. It empowers businesses to establish, grow, and thrive in the online marketplace.

If you want to gain foundational knowledge and practical skills to navigate and leverage Shopify's robust features, this course is for you. By the end of it, you’ll be equipped with everything you need to build your online store and run it successfully.


What will you learn in this course?

  • After completing this course, you will know how to work with Shopify: from setting up your store to promoting with the help of various tools

  • Learn how to perform basic SEO tasks before you start working on the website

  • Find out more about keywords and collecting semantic core

  • Discover how to write effective commercial content

  • Learn how to design the home page and fill all pages and sections

  • Get to know about the integration of payment systems

  • Learn how to choose a domain name and connect it

  • Work with analytics - both internal and GA4

  • Connect Facebook Pixel and Google Merchant

  • Explore how to work with various plugins for site promotion

  • Learn how to run advertising campaigns and promote the site with a minimal budget and for free

  • Connect email marketing tools and create email newsletters

  • Get to know more about how to prepare for holiday sales

  • Find out how to work on your store regularly and what points to consider


YOU’LL HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO LEARN SEO FROM TOP DIGITAL MARKETING PROFESSIONALS:

  • Julia Gubanova, a seasoned marketer and promotion specialist, advises individual entrepreneurs and companies on business development in B2C markets.

  • Our academy has 15 years of experience in online marketing. Our Webpromo Agency has both Google Premier Partner status and Facebook Marketing Partner status

  • Our instructors collected a vast amount of digital marketing qualifications and marketing certifications (Google Analytics Individual Qualification, Google Ads Individual Qualification, Bing Ads Accredited Professional, Search Ads360 Certified, and others)

  • We've launched over 1,500 successful marketing strategies and campaigns throughout our careers

  • Over 500,000 digital marketing specialists worldwide have enrolled in our online courses. Our free online events, blog, and YouTube tutorials help the SkillsBooster community stay in the loop and get all the tips they need to succeed in digital marketing

OUR TRAINING INCLUDES:

Theory: 2+ hours of lectures with plenty of hands-on examples. Lessons range from 3 to 15 minutes and are easy to follow

Practice Materials: Checklists, templates, and video tutorials to make the course more interactive and valuable

Lifetime access to the course and any future updates

Students’ Support: If you have questions, I will always be willing to answer them

Complete the course and receive an Udemy certificate


SHOULD YOU BE WORRIED?

This course comes with a 30-day money-back guarantee

Shopify is a real springboard for creative minds and budding entrepreneurs! Enroll and learn how to start your online store with Shopify!
targetAudiences: E-commerce entrepreneurs aiming to understand Shopify's fundamentals for a successful launch
Marketers aiming to optimize e-commerce strategies for clients

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT for Advertising Creative: Generate Campaign Concepts
courseDetails.shortDescription: Ad Campaign Mastery: ChatGPT's Creative Power
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "ChatGPT for Advertising Creative: Generate Campaign Concepts" In this course, you'll discover that creativity can indeed be learned and mastered. We'll explore the patterns and structures that can be used to generate innovative ideas and leverage the power of ChatGPT to enhance your creative output. Discover how prompt engineering with ChatGPT can revolutionize your advertising ideation process and generate innovative ideas that captivate audiences.

What You Will Learn:

1. Understanding Effective Client Briefs and Assignments:

· Identify the essential components of a client brief or assignment that contribute to successful advertising campaigns.

2. Translating Briefs into ChatGPT Prompts for Creative Ideation:

· Gain the skills to effectively translate client briefs into prompts that generate innovative advertising ideas using ChatGPT.

· Learn techniques for structuring prompts to elicit specific types of creative output.

3. Exploring Creative Thinking Patterns in Celebrated Advertising Campaigns:

· Study the creative thinking patterns employed in renowned advertising campaigns to understand their success.

· Apply these creative thinking patterns to generate unique and compelling ideas for your own campaigns.

4. Integrating Creative Thinking Tools into ChatGPT Ideation Prompts:

· Discover a variety of creative thinking tools and techniques to enhance the ideation process.

· Learn how to incorporate these tools into ChatGPT prompts to stimulate creativity and generate diverse ideas.

5. Evaluating Prompt Quality for Improved Output:

· Develop the ability to assess the quality and effectiveness of your prompts.

· Gain insights into refining and optimizing prompts to generate higher-quality output from ChatGPT.

6. Adapting and Pivoting Prompts for Creative Business Success:

· Learn strategies for adapting and troubleshooting prompts to overcome challenges and maximize the potential of ChatGPT.

· Discover how to leverage ChatGPT as a valuable tool for your creative business and adapt it to different scenarios.

By mastering these skills and knowledge, you will be equipped with the tools and techniques to effectively utilize ChatGPT for creative ideation, ensuring exceptional advertising ideas that resonate with audiences and drive meaningful results. Join this course now to unlock your creative potential with AI and take your advertising game to new heights!

Throughout the course, you'll engage in hands-on exercises and practical examples, allowing you to apply the concepts directly to real-world advertising scenarios. We'll guide you through the step-by-step process of leveraging ChatGPT and thinking tools to ideate and craft impactful advertising campaigns.
targetAudiences: Budding ad agency professionals
Freelancers
Content creators
